name: prior
posTip: A word that describes a noun or pronoun.

dsense.name: prior
dsense.posTip: A word that describes a noun or pronoun.

trans_examp.trans_en: existing or happening before something else, or before a particular time

example.eg: The course required no prior knowledge of Spanish.
example.egtrans: 这门课不要求先前学过西班牙语。

example.eg: They had to refuse the dinner invitation because of a prior engagement (= something already planned for that time).
example.egtrans: 因为事先另有约会，他们只好拒绝了吃饭的邀请。

dsense_body_def_block_kk.def: before a particular time or event

example.eg: the weeks prior to her death

dsense.name: prior
dsense.posTip: A word that describes a noun or pronoun.

example.eg: Mothers with young children have a prior claim on funds.
example.egtrans: 抚育幼儿的母亲拥有优先获得资助的权利。

name: prior
posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

trans_examp.trans_en: a man who is in charge of a priory or who is second in charge of an abbey
trans_examp.trans_cn: 小隐修院院长；隐修院副院长
